channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Corners of Vicarage Grove. Again, 9th November
item.description:
Thus happens too often, I have reported directly and by using this app. Selfish customers bad company

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing dog bin, 9th November
item.description:
Bin outside 75 - 77 Camberwell Grove has been overflowing onto the street for over a week, with bags of dog faeces now ont he pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pigeon - death by catapult from the kids on the estate!, 9th November
item.description:
Looks as though the pigeon has been hit as it was found face down in the garden in a pool of blood. There are multiple young boys with catapults daily doing this - they look at the rooves of the houses and take a shot. It’s cruel and they are vile. Please can the pigeon be removed it’s been bagged and left on the drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 135, Lullingstone Crescent, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole and cracks in the road spanning so much of the road., 9th November
item.description:
